ZOJ 3209 Treasure Map

Jul 6, 2009 • {"display_name"=>"twcai", "login"=>"admin", "email"=>"clumsywyvern@gmail.com", "url"=>"http://www.caitengwei.com"}

精确覆盖问题，看着DLX算法的伪码打的。
以格子为行，矩形为列，构造一个描述覆盖情况的矩形，用DLX算法求解。

其他可以用dancing links求解的题目还有
nuaa 1267 N皇后问题</a><br/>
hust 1017 Exact Cover</a>
23849 clumsydragon 1017 Accepted 1872 kb 256 ms C++ 2253 B 2009-07-10 13:37:56<br/>
spoj 1771 Yet Another N-Queen Problem</a>
2559174 2009-07-12 07:19:00 CD Yet Another N-Queen Problem accepted 0.36 2.6M C++<br/>
tju 3219 Radar</a><br/>
fzu 1686 神龙的难题</a><br/>
神龙的难题允许overlap的覆盖，写了3遍还是TLE，先放一放

贴下3209的代码

#include 

#include 

using namespace std;

#define sz 451451


int l[sz], r[sz], u[sz], d[sz], y[sz];

int s[961];


int n, m, ret;


inline void remove(const int &c) {

	int i, j;

	r[l[c]] = r[c];

	l[r[c]] = l[c];

	for(i = d[c]; i != c; i = d[i]) {

		for(j = r[i]; j != i; j = r[j]) {

			d[u[j]] = d[j];

			u[d[j]] = u[j];

			s[y[j]] --;

		}

	}

}


inline void resume(const int &c) {

	int i, j;

	for(i = u[c]; i != c; i = u[i]) {

		for(j = l[i]; j != i; j = l[j]) {

			d[u[j]] = j;

			u[d[j]] = j;

			s[y[j]] ++;

		}

	}

	r[l[c]] = c;

	l[r[c]] = c;

}


inline int dfs(int k) {

	if(ret <= k)

		return 0;


	int i, j, c;

	if(r[0] == 0) {

		if(k < ret)

			ret = k;

		return 1;

	}

	int mi = 0x7FFFFFFF;

	for(i = r[0]; i; i = r[i]) {

		if(s[i] < mi) {

			mi = s[i];

			c = i;

		}

	}


	remove(c);

	for(i = d[c]; i != c; i = d[i]) {

		for(j = r[i]; j != i; j = r[j]) {

			remove(y[j]);

		}


		dfs(k + 1);


		for(j = l[i]; j != i; j = l[j]) {

			resume(y[j]);

		}

	}

	resume(c);


	return 0;

}


int main()

{

	int t, tn, tm, t1, t2, pos;

	int i, j, k;

	int x1, y1, x2, y2;

	scanf("%d", &t);


	while(t --) {

		scanf("%d %d %d", &tn, &tm, &n);

		m = tn * tm;

		for(i = 0; i <= m; i++) {

			if(i + 1 > m)

				t1 = 0;

			else

				t1 = i + 1;

			r[i] = t1, l[t1] = i;

			u[i] = i;

			s[i] = 0;

		}


		int hd;

		t2 = m + 1;


		for(i = 1; i <= n; i++) {

			scanf("%d %d %d %d", &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2);

			hd = t2;

			x2 --, y2 --;

			for(j = y1; j <= y2; j++) {

				pos = j * tn + x1 + 1;

				for(k = x1; k <= x2; k++) {

					t1 = t2;

					if(j == y2 && k == x2)

						t2 = hd;

					else

						t2 ++;

					u[t1] = u[pos], d[u[t1]] = t1;

					u[pos] = t1, s[pos] ++;

					r[t1] = t2, l[t2] = t1;

					y[t1] = pos;

					pos++;

				}

			}

			t2 = t1 + 1;

		}


		bool fg = 1;


		for(j = 1; j <= m; j++) {

			if(!s[j]) {

				fg = 0;

				break;

			}

			d[u[j]] = j;

		}


		if(!fg)

			printf("-1\n");

		else {

			ret = 0x7FFFFFFF;

			dfs(0);

			if(ret == 0x7FFFFFFF)

				printf("-1\n");

			else

				printf("%d\n", ret);

		}

	}

	return 0;

}


/*

2


5 10 9

0 0 5 1

0 1 5 2

0 2 5 3

0 3 5 4

0 4 5 5

0 5 5 10

2 3 5 10

0 5 2 10

0 3 2 5


30 30 8

0 0 11 30

11 0 30 11

11 11 20 20

11 20 20 30

20 11 30 30

0 0 11 11

0 11 11 30

0 0 30 20

*/</pre>
